Soft, thick material that's slightly stretchy and very warm. This is the cutest sweat suit I've ever worn by far.

I was hesitant not sizing up because of the top. I am larger chested and curvier, so it can be tough with sizing online. Show as described on the Amazon online store. Design & Style: Good  Quality of material: Good  Stitching & Sewing: Good  Fit for size: Good  Cost/Price Value: Fair  Shows as described: Yes

I ordered 2 of these sets. One brown and one blue. The brown is definitely brighter than shown but the blue is pretty true to color. The hoodie fits great but the pants are short on me and not the best fit. The quality is great tho, they’re very thick and warm. They’re pretty true to size and very comfortable. My only complaint is the fit of the pants.
This is even cute on my short wide body with a lot of hip and behind. That's hard to do with sweat suits.
I like the material.  I was surprised it is thick and comfortable.  The color doesn't fade, such a great value for your money. I will be buying obe in each color. I recommend !

评论概述: There are only 2 things about this I'm not crazy about
评论详情: I love statement outfits when the statements are things like "no actually I did *not* want to get out of bed" and this outfit very clearly states that while still looking nice enough that I might occasionally feel compelled to add some earrings when I wear it.  Occasionally.  The fabric is a really nice quality fleece, you can definitely tell it's a polyester blend but it's still soft and comfy, and the side that's next to the skin is very fuzzy.  It fits true to the size chart (please pardon my very dusty mirror), I'm 5'3" 150lbs and went with a Large to make sure I had lots of extra room because I have 40" hips and didn't want to risk the pants not being as loose as I like, but a Medium would have worked too, just wouldn't have been quite as baggy.  There are only two things about this set that I wish were different.  First is, there's a decorative seam that runs the entire length of the pants both front and back. It doesn't really do anything but look nice on the front so it's fine, but on the back it rubs a little annoyingly whenever I sit down or lean against anything.  Second is, this is a pretty thick fabric and the hood is two layers of that thick fabric, so it gets pretty bulky around the neck and shoulders when it's worn with the hood down.  Neither of these things is likely to keep me from spending about 40% of the winter in this set. But they are things to be aware of before you order.

This two piece sweatsuit outfit is so comfortable. It’s somehow lightweight but incredibly warm without making you sweat at the same time. The material is SO soft and the color is gorgeous (and matches the picture exactly, at least in terms of the green). I ordered this in a small and width/girth size it’s bigger than I was expecting, but length wise it’s borderline too short on both items. I’m roughly 5’9, so there is absolutely no excess or bunched up material around the ankles like in the picture. The hoodie is also shorter torso wise than I like (it’s almost showing my stomach) and the sleeves are almost too short. So if you’re someone that prefers a baggier sweatshirt and sweatpants I’d suggest going up a size. If not, stick with your normal size.
I got this but for my height it just didn’t fit right.  For someone shorter it would be perfect but it just didn’t go well with me being taller with a long torso.  Material is comfortable though.

I ordered a size 2x because it was on sale and I wanted an oversized look and feel, I normally wear a xl and when I first tried it on it was loose and so soft and comfy I wore it that day to lying around the house in. The material is thicker and very soft than I would have thought it would be for the price. I forgot that I had ordered a 2x and went back and ordered a large because I wanted another with a more fitted feel, the pants fit ok but the top was too short when I lifted my arms so I gave that one to my stepdaughter. The quality of the material is great for the price so far, I have washed it once and it came out looking great and still feeling soft but I haven’t put it on yet so idk if it shrank much. Will update when I do.

It is very thick, I wish it wasn’t quite as bulky but if you are looking for something to keep you warm, this set will definitely do just that.  It is well constructed, not as soft as I would like but still comfortable. Runs true to size.

This is very very thick fabric. It’ll be perfect for winter. However it’s too hot for summertime in my opinion. It’s very well made and super comfortable. Sizing is pretty accurate. I’m 125lbs 5ft and the small fits me decently however the pants are a tad bit long.
It fits nicely
RUNS SMALL!!! I ordered a large so that the set would be baggy on me and while they are baggy, it’s not by much. Besides that, they’re so soft and very warm. Great for winter time.

评论概述: Size UP if you want it baggy!
评论详情: My XL definitely fits more like a LARGE, so size up if you want it loose. I assumed I was wearing a large, expected x-large to be swimming in it. Beyond the size this is the perfect sweat set. The fabric is super soft and like you would expect from sweatpants, it doesn't have the weird plastic-y feel I've felt from other online brands. The interior is that warm, fuzzy feel that you would expect from sweats. Pants have deep pockets (my large phone just fits) and top has individual pockets on each side. Great fall investment piece! Color is hot.
I purchased this identical set in Nike and I prefer this one. Super comfortable, excellent quality. So soft!

Soft fleece on the inside. I didn't care for the hood, felt heavy & bulky.  The pocket placement on the sweatshirt seems too high, I don't want pockets at my ribcage. But, I do have a long torso, so not everyone may have same issue with pockets. Whole outfit fit loose, but I wouldn't call it oversized. I'm 5'6", 140 pounds & ordered a medium.  Felt it made me look bigger than I am.
This is the ideal cool weather lounge suit! It's thick and soft and so comfortable! I highly recommend it!

Love the blue color. Also love that I can wear it as a whole outfit or just the top or bottom with something else and it still looks good. Very comfy and the material doesn’t make it too hot so I can still wear it during the cooler days in summer. Very light weight and after going through 4 washes, it’s maintain its color and size.
Perfect and perfectly perfect !!! Only wish would be that the pants would be a bit smaller than the hoodie , cause they’re huge!
Fabric is an excellent weight. Fit is spot on

Medium definitely way too long for a 5'3 person. But that's not the problem, the main problem is the huge thick seam across the middle which is weird and uncomfortable. The pockets are way too high, they come right below your breasts so nobody wants to put their hands way up there. The pants are also have a strange fat seam, but it's not too uncomfortable.
Never received the cream color. The grey one is nice though.

This set is very cozy! I sized up, even though I know it would have still looked over-sized if I got a Small. I went with a Medium, and I am happy with how well it fits. The bottoms elastic waistband is not too tight, making the baggy sweatpants comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I often get size Medium bottoms, but I can tell the small would have still fit comfortably (size 4 typically). They stay on securely. The sweater as well gives room around the collar and has a very large hood! The hoodie sweater and the sweat pants both have a line through them that is discreet but adds a unique touch. The material of the set is nice and thick and the inside fuzzy! Not a bad price. It isn't the MOST buttery soft set out there as far as the external material goes, but it is durable and satisfying to feel. I really like the shade of grayish blue, and think it can be dressed up to look more expensive than it is. Definitely cozy, while also giving classy vibes that can easily fancify any errands day or gym visit!

Wow this set is so plush and soft. The stitching is really well done! There is some design stitching down the pants that makes it more unique. Looks and feels comparable to known brands. The beige is a nice neutral color and looks exactly as pictured. The top is more of a cropped style instead of a full length. I absolutely love it. Great set for the fall!

This is the one!!!! This is an excellent quality sweatsuit set! Sometimes photos are deceiving but this is exactly as it looks in the photos and feels amazing! This set is just like those ultra popular ones that you see all over social media. Or better.  As soon as I felt this, I was in love. It is nice and thick, soft on the outside, but super soft and warm on the inside! This is an excellent fall and winter set. The price is 100% justified, it is so worth it. I'd say on size, size up one. This is intended to look a little baggy as opposed to super fitted. Like oversized. I'm usually small and I got medium, so glad I did. The top seems a bit cropped and I think small would be too small and fitted for the oversized look we want. This would make an excellent gift, and I plan on purchasing a set for my sister. And more colors for myself! The brown is beautiful and I want a set in every color! I cannot tell you how good this is.

The light blue color is so pretty.  I ordered size medium because I'm tall (5'11/130) and the hem of the pants go to my ankles, thankfully.  The hoodie is slightly cropped and kind of sits around the waistline.  The material is 50 cotton 50 poly so it's super soft.  I always check the waistband size on the chart and make sure I get the size sweatpants I want even if the hoodie might be too big.  (Nothing worse than the waistband being too tight).  This set is great for running errands or wearing to the airport.  Highly recommend!
5.0 super comfortable machine washable super cute for quality and price would recommened

This is super comfy and looks like a good quality sweat set. Love that you can wear it together or mix and match. The pale green color is really cute. I wear a size 16, and the XL was a perfect oversized fit. Would love to get another color of this!
Love this super cute super comfy and warm I bought it on sale fits me perfect. Like them baggy and it’s not too short I’m 5’ 10 and it’s so cute

I ordered the black color which is nice and dark.  The hoodie is slightly cropped but not showing belly.  The sweatpants have seams down the front and back which make them look classier than regular plain sweatpants.  The material is thick and warm.  They washed up perfectly on the cold cycle and medium dry.  A cute set that you can wear many places!

评论概述: Pricey But Worth It! Very Nice Matching Set!
评论详情: Exactly as described and photographed. I love everything about this beautiful set of WARM! This will be my 2024 Winter *I'm Not Going Anywhere outfit! ;) This set is made very well and the material is high quality too! This set looks expensive in Beige! Not the usual winter color for sweat pants! I believe this set will last far beyond 2 seasons! The craftsmanship is so obvious once you get this in your hands! Lots of little touches that make this a very classy set of winter sweat pants! Hope my honest review helps you!

This sweatsuit is medium to heavyweight and it will do a great job of keeping me warm and comfortable during the cooler months. I love the color and the softness of the material. The quality is amazing and I haven't had any shrinkage or fading even after being washed multiple times. It has also held its shape. I'm in the middle of a weight loss journey so I ordered it a size larger than I could have, but I like my sweat suits baggy. The legs are a nice length for my 33" inseam and the hood is large so it covers my whole head nicely. I fell in love with it the second I put it on and I know I'm going to be wearing it a lot once the temps cool off. I
Super comfortable thick and warm. Good quality cotton. True to size. Good gift idea.

I’ve never been so excited for winter! This outfit’s a touch too warm for Florida summers, but it’s so soft and cozy that I just can’t wait to wear it. It’s nice and roomy, too, and there are deep and functional pockets on both the pants and the hoody.  I think it looks great, too, and the fit is exactly as expected. I do find the inseam runs a little low, allowing my thighs to touch, which isn’t my favorite feeling. It’s fine with shorts, though. My only other complaint would be the pointy style of the hood - I prefer the rounded look - but that’s a matter of personal preference.  On the whole, I absolutely love this outfit and I can’t wait to wear it and eat junk food for about 3 straight days in winter.

This sweatsuit is very thick and super soft. The pants are thick and will keep my legs warm during the cold months. The hoodie fits perfect and has a deep middle pocket I like. The material is high quality and it’s best to be machine washed in cold water and hung dry.
Was just too bulky on me. I looked huge!!

This cozy set is all I need for this fall/winter!! It’s so beautiful the color is so pretty and the size is perfect I’m 5’4 and 120 pounds and I got a small and this is the perfect size for me!
